attributes.additional_details:
The eco building has had and continues to have a positive impact on the local community. Local schools participated in the construction of the building and the building is used by our allotment holders and is also used by a mens mental health charity project. 

The building was built from recycled tyres, recycled timbers, glass bottles, wattled and daub, recycled plastics, recycled astroturf, all recycled materials would have otherwise gone to land fill.
attributes.background: Help to save the Eco building from being knocked down by Warrington borough council.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
